channel.title: Help please
channel.description:
i am a noob at java programming sort of thing.
i need just some basic things that i dont know. ...
1 how to add shops with working prices everything. 2 admin/owner command to raise stats auto to 135. 3 npcs how too add in? 4 will not change start messages i have gone into client java and changed it and saved compiled. and it dont work.?? 5 how do i get ::pickup command too work? no flaming please.
